channel.title: Latex on Website of Dmitry Kabanov
channel.description: Recent content in Latex on Website of Dmitry Kabanov

item.title: Colaborate in Latex: Overleaf and local git
item.description: When you write a paper in \(\LaTeX\) and your collaborators prefer to use Overleaf but you prefer to use local setup, then you can do it with the help of the git version control system.
